abstract: Women are buying movie tickets at almost unprecedented degree, while traditional lucrative audience of young men is spending comparatively less at box office as industry gears up for summer blockbuster season; young men are more easily distracted by other forms of entertainment and women may be more reliable opening-weekend audience.
lead_paragraph: Women are driving movie ticket sales to a degree rarely seen before, while young men, long the most coveted audience, are relatively AWOL.

headline.main: At the Box Office, It’s No Longer a Man’s World
headline.print_headline: At the Box Office, It’s No Longer a Man’s World

snippet: Women are driving movie ticket sales to a degree rarely seen before, while young men, long the most coveted audience, are relatively AWOL.
